titles.title: Leave No Americans Behind Act of 2018
To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to eliminate the repatriation loan program, and for other purposes.
Leave No Americans Behind Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Leave No Americans Behind Act of 2018
This bill amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to eliminate the requirement that Department of State evacuation loans to private U.S. citizens or third-country nationals facing war, civil unrest, or natural disasters be reimbursable.
